mapper.select: SELECT bcc.CertId,bci.CompanyName AS 'CompanyId',sd.DictName AS 'CerType', bcc.CertNo,bcc.StartDate,bcc.Validity FROM TB_BASE_COMPANY_CERTIFICATE bcc JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON sd.DictId=bcc.CertType JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO bci ON bci.CompanyId=bcc.CompanyId WHERE datediff(day,GETDATE(),bcc.Validity) <=0 AND bcc.CompanyId= #{companyId}

SELECT (CASE WHEN be2.PCode=0 THEN be2.TypeName + '-' ELSE '' END)+be1.TypeName AS 'EquipType', rad.EquipCode,rad.AlarmDate,rad.RealValue,rad.Threshold FROM TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA rad JOIN TB_BASE_EQUIP_TYPE be1 ON rad.EquipType LIKE '%'+ be1.TypeCode LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_EQUIP_TYPE be2 ON be2.TypeCode=be1.PCode AND rad.EquipType LIKE be2.TypeCode + '%' JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO bci ON rad.EquipCode LIKE bci.UniqueCode + '%' WHERE bci.UniqueCode IS NOT NULL AND bci.UniqueCode != '' AND (rad.Status != 0 OR rad.Status IS NULL) AND bci.CompanyId = #{companyId}
